import React, { useState } from "react"; import './Calculadora.css' import Container from '@mui/material/Container'; import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; export default function Calculadora(){ const [num, setNum] = useState(0) function ExibirNum(e){ const exib = e.target.value num===0 ? setNum(exib) : setNum(num+exib) } function Clear(){ setNum(0) } return (

{num}
) }
